Feedback? We'd be happy to discuss it.
Read our story, how we started.

q.1: What coin is used for NFTs?
q.2: What wallet do I need to mint, buy and collect?
q.4: How I can trade KSM for my artwork?
q.5: How I can buy KSM as new-comer?
q.6: How I can buy KSM with ETH, DAI, BTC..?
q.7: What's the flow when I'm NFT creator?
q.8: Can I use this in virtual worlds?
q.9: I've got errors, how to resolve them?
q.10: What does SEND, CONSUME, LIST mean?
q.11: I've minted NFT, but I don't see it in gallery, where is it?
q.13: How I will sell my token?
q.15: How I can create own shop?
q.19: Will you have AR/VR mode or implementation?
q.21: How do I update metadata for extension?

1.m: Kusama network, $KSM. You can get it through our Credit feature or through custodial exchange

2.m: We reccommend you to use Polkadot Extension for now. Later we plan to add mobile-first experience. In all cases, backup your seed, it's your owners right and sort of value.

3.m: You will go to the Create. You need to first mint your Collection and then Token. If you want to video that, DM us!

4.m: Its supported widely on popular exchanges. At time of writing this FAQ, 2nd February, daily liqudity on exchanges is around $200M at time of writing and 1 $KSM is traded for ~ $100. Check for recent price at Coingecko

5.m: We have integration with Ramp.network, click on Credit in navbar. You can use Revolut, Manual bank transfer, Debit Card and Apple Pay to top-up your KSM address. You can buy $KSM at Binance

6.m: For best rates, you can use custodial exchange from list. For best experience we reccommend you to use Binance. If you are looking for simple trade, try SimpleSwap.

7.m: First of all, you need to install Polkadot Extension, backup your seed. Then you top up your wallet address through our Credit feature. Once you have funds, head to Create, create Collection. Wait till Collection is minted, then you go to Create Token and Mint your very first token! If you had issues, we are working on our UX-flow. KodaDot has around month old code and there is still room to improve, bear with us, we are just team of two. Happy Minting ðŸ˜Œ

8.m: We are exploring possibilities, we actually plan to actively research on this in our milestone 2

9.m: We are trying delivering incremental updates on daily basis & fixes ASAP. We may published new version and your browser has cached old one. If you are on Windows, try hold down Ctrl and then press F5. Mac users, hold down CMD and Shift and then press R. If this did not help, DMs on Twitter with screenshot where is developer console open.

10.m: SEND will send it to someone, CONSUME will burn it, LIST will list it for sale so someone can buy it from you.

11.m: Best way is to check through Subscan Explorer and lookup your address. You can find example how minted NFT looks through explorer, when you look on extrinsics.

12.m: Right now, we are aware that US is not supported, other all countries should work, full list of supported countries. This is out of our control right now.

13.m: Right now, you will use LIST in Actions.

14.m: Right now, we don't have chain logic, but we plan to implement something great, soon. Stay with us and follow us @KodaDot!

15.m: We are implementing collection view, sets of collection view. Stay with us and follow us @KodaDot!

16.m: It's that heart ðŸ–¤ under NFT token. We are origin authors of EMOTE in RMRK standard which works like appreciations. It's function is price discovery for your work.

17.m: Right now, we have Kusama Treasury funding for Milestone 1. We are actively looking for funding options, eventually we would raise private funds. DMs us, if you are interested into private sale.

18.m: We have only private channel for NFT creators, DM us if you are NFT creator!

19.m: Yes, that's part of our Milestone 2, stay tuned!

20.m: If you are on Mac, on Chrome hit Option, CMD, J, Firefox Command + Option + K.

21.m: Go to Dotapps.io, Settings > Metadata and see there button Update metadata, then refresh your window, should be working with recent chain types

22.m: Check if you have transferable $KSM on your account, not staked. That's different. You can check it at Dotapps.io > Accounts and at balances unfold, you can see there Transferable amount.

23.m: You can learn more how to set identity on Kusama network
